title: WinRM Https Configuration
description: Configures WinRM host to enable communication with the PowerShell plug-in through the HTTPS protocol

HostName.description: The FQDN of machine or Domain, use the format *.azureregion.cloudapp.azure.com. For example *.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com

Port.description: Specify the port to be used for default Https traffic.
